Deepika Padukone Looks Gorgeous In These Beautiful Pictures
Deepika Padukone Looks Gorgeous In These Beautiful Pictures
Deepika Padukone is one of the highest paid actresses in the world and also the most popular. She made her acting debut with a South Indian film Aishwarya in 2006. She entered Bollywood with the blockbuster Farah Khan directorial Om Shanti Om where she was launched by Bollywood super star Shah Rukh Khan.
Her roles in Love Aaj Kal (2009), Lafangey Parindey (2010) drew praise as she began to showcase her acting skills for good.
In 2012, romantic comedy Cocktail earned plaudits for her and since then there is no looking back for her. Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani and Chennai Express (both 2013), the heist comedy Happy New Year (2014), and Sanjay Leela Bhansali's period dramas Bajirao Mastani (2015) and Padmaavat (2018), brought her both fame and laurels. She also has a pivotol role in Hollywood thriller action film XXX: Return of Xander Cage (2017).

title: Deepika Padukone Looks Gorgeous In These Beautiful Pictures
description: Deepika Padukone is one of the most highly-paid actresses in the world and also the most popular and attractive personality in the nation. Besides acting, she is the founder of The Live Love Laugh Foundation and even designed her own line of clothing. Deepika Padukone made her acting debut with a Kannada film Aishwarya in 2006.
